exchange.modal.confirmInWallet: Confirm this transaction in your wallet
exchange.priceDetails.minimumReceived.de: Your transaction will be reversed if there is a large, unfavourable price movement before it is confirmed
exchange.priceDetails.priceImpact.desc: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size
exchange.priceDetails.lpFee.desc: For each trade a 0.4% fee is paid. 0.3% goes to liquidity providers and 0.1% goes to the EDDASwap treasury
exchange.createPool.desc: and earn 0.3% swap fee on every trade
exchange.title: Exchange
liquidity.add.noLiquidityDesc:
You are the first liquidity provider. 
 The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool. 
 Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
liquidity.add.isLiquidityDesc: When you add liquidity, you will receive pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
liquidity.add.modal.confirm.title: You will receive
liquidity.add.modal.confirm.outputIsEsti: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than {{slippage}}% your transaction will revert.
liquidity.import.title: Import Pool
liquidity.import.selectToken: Select a token to find your liquidity
liquidity.import.dontHaveLp: You don't have liquidity in this pool yet
liquidity.remove.connectWallet: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
liquidity.remove.donttSeePool: Don't see a pool you joined?
liquidity.remove.title: Remove Liquidity
liquidity.remove.desc: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
liquidity.title: Liquidity
liquidity.addLiquidity: Add liquidity to receive LP tokens
nft.nftCollection.desc: Add liquidity and stake your EDDA's LP tokens to earn samurai and redeem NFTs
nft.stake.modal.title: Confirm Stake
nft.unstake.modal.title: Confirm Unstake
exchange.modal.confirm.warning1: Output is estimated. You will receive at least

nft.vesting.card.willUnlockAt: You will be able to unlock at

migration.title: Migrate
migration.desc: Migrate your LP tokens to continue earning.
migration.remove.desc: Unstake your old LP tokens from the old liquidity pools
migration.add.title: Add Liquidity to new Liquidity Pools
migration.add.desc: Stake your tokens in the updated Liquidity Pools
migration.alert: Trading on V1 is not permitted. Liquidity Providers can remove their liquidity and migrate it to V2. Continue trading several pairs on V2
